body:
Comment 11: 
Found culprit:

SourceTree after one update added some rules for eol conversion:
https://answers.atlassian.com/questions/184844/when-committing-using-mercurial-all-lines-in-every-file-will-be-modified-causing-merge-conflicts

Removing unnecessary rules from marcurial.ini and cloning Go source again fixed problem.

Best regards,
Dobrosław Żybort
